Articles.Content: I encountered a strange issue, my separatrons fail to activate when I press stage button. They can be activated manually or via the action button, but not during staging process. I add separatrons on the boosters to help them off the rocket safely, but now they simply won't start. Has anyone encountered similar problems?

Starting today I've had a similar problem.

When staging many things fail to activate; decouplers, gantries, and engines so far.

The problem is so bad I switched to my sandbox mode to try and debug it.

[Here is an output_log](https://www.dropbox.com/s/lott8cn45pfwmt5/stage_nonactivation_output_log.txt?dl=0) with the problem and >100 mods.

I'll post a cleaner one if I can narrow the problem down.

edit:

0.90 x86 windows 7

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-08T23:34:19Z" title="04/08/2015 11:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 8, 2015</time> by Invader Myk**
  
forgot version and OS
Have you updated any mods recently? I updated many and it would be helpful if you could narrow my search.

That's the most annoying part of this.

The last time I updated any mods was over a week ago and I had played the night before with no issues.

I haven't had any time to play since my last post, but hopefully tonight I can do some troubleshooting.

edit2:I've tested all my mods 10 at a time and wasn't able to reproduce the problem. So I went back to all mods and couldn't reproduce it.

edit: Here's a list of my mods. Let me know which ones you do NOT have so I can skip those in testing.
